snippet.title: Boulders: Puzzle WIP trailer
snippet.description:
The goal of Boulders: Puzzle is to reach the goal cube in the level with the player cuboid. To do this you can connect the player cuboid with other cubes to help you traverse the level.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1492290/Boulders_Puzzle/
Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.FarewellGames.BouldersPuzzle
Itchi.io https://farewell-games.itch.io/boulders-puzzle
GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/boulders_puzzle/556266
IndieDB: https://www.indiedb.com/games/boulders-puzzle/
